summary: Based on the 16th-century Chinese novel Feng Shen Yan Yi (The Investiture of the Gods), the story tells of how King Zhou of Shang becomes a tyrant due to the wiles of Daji, a vixen spirit who is disguised as one of his concubines.
cast: Jet Li|Bingbing Fan|Zhang Wen|Xiaoming Huang|Louis Koo|Angelababy|Jacky Heung|Tony Ka Fai Leung|Feng Zu|Andy On|Qing Xu|Waise Lee|Jordan Chan|Pengfei Qin|Jaden He|Zhipeng Wang|Kate Hawkins|Heath Pennington
title: League of Gods
